mapper.sql: ID, GOODS_NO, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_TYPE, GOODS_SPECIFY, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_PHOTO, STATUS, IS_HOT, IS_NEW, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_AT
mapper.select:
select
from M_GOODS_INFO where GOODS_NAME LIKE #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS = 1

select
from M_GOODS_INFO where GOODS_TYPE = #{goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and STATUS = 1

select
from M_GOODS_INFO where IS_HOT = #{isHot,jdbcType=TINYINT} and STATUS = 1

select
from M_GOODS_INFO where IS_NEW = #{isNew,jdbcType=TINYINT} and IS_HOT = 0 and STATUS = 1
mapper.insert: insert into M_GOODS_INFO (ID, GOODS_NO, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_TYPE, GOODS_SPECIFY, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_PHOTO, STATUS, IS_HOT, IS_NEW, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_AT ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsSpecify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHot,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isNew,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update M_GOODS_INFO
GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_TYPE = #{goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOODS_SPECIFY = #{goodsSpecify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_PRICE = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GOODS_PHOTO = #{goodsPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update M_GOODS_INFO set GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_TYPE = #{goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GOODS_SPECIFY = #{goodsSpecify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_PRICE = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GOODS_PHOTO = #{goodsPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_HOT = #{isHot,jdbcType=TINYINT}, IS_NEW = #{isNew,jdbcType=TINYINT}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
